sentence: The Board of Directors of DXC Technology today declared a regular quarterly dividend payment for the quarter ending March 31, 2019 of $0.21 per share on the company's Common Stock.
The dividend will be paid on July 16, 2019 to stockholders of record at the close of business on June 5, 2019.

Extra Space Storage announced today that the Company's board of directors has declared a quarterly dividend of $0.90 per share on the common stock of the Company for the second quarter 2019, a 4.7% increase from the previous quarter.
The dividend is payable on June 28, 2019 to stockholders of record at the close of business on June 14, 2019.
The Mosaic Company announced today that its Board of Directors declared a quarterly dividend of $0.05 per share on the Company's common stock.
The dividend will be paid on June 20, 2019, to stockholders of record as of the close of business on June 6, 2019.
Today, McDonald's Board of Directors declared a quarterly cash dividend of $1.16 per share of common stock payable on June 17, 2019 to shareholders of record at the close of business on June 3, 2019.
The Home Depot, the world's largest home improvement retailer, today announced that its board of directors declared a first quarter cash dividend of $1.36 per share.
The dividend is payable on June 20, 2019, to shareholders of record on the close of business on June 6, 2019.
This is the 129th consecutive quarter the company has paid a cash dividend.
